name: Heart of Moon : The Mask of Seasons
description: Clara and her adoptive father have discovered the location of an ancient artifact called the Mask of Seasons. It is supposed to be hidden in a temple on an island, lost in the middle of the Pacific.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 ,8 ,8.1, 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or more Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 110 MB available space
